actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to restrict the issuance of search warrants with respect to certain property possessed by persons who are not suspects in a criminal investigation.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits the issuance of a warrant to search for or seize any property, other than contraband, fruits of a crime, or things criminally possessed, that is in the possession or on the premises of a person who is not suspected of committing a crime with respect to such property. Allows the issuance of a warrant if there is reasonable cause to believe that such property will: (1) be destroyed; (2) be removed from the premises; or (3) otherwise become unavailable.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to restrict the issuance of search warrants with respect to certain property possessed by persons who are not suspects in a criminal investigation.
